data.author: Manel Torrecilla

changelog.release_notes: Now, with time, date, arcs activity, calories, km/miles information and weather, you have more battery life and more weather precision.

Now, with calories!

You can see, from up to down:
- Left:  weather icon, the arches for percentage steps for the day and for the last week. The kilometers and the week day.
- Center: hours and activity icon.
- Right: temperature. The Inactivity arch, calories, minutes and month day.
Solved some problem with buttons (Thanks Steve).

First versi√≥n.

Time & Date & Activity & Weather & Battery.

data.description:
A watch that shows the day kilometers/miles and calories done. The kilometers-miles and celsius - farenheit options are selected from mobile setup.
Displays some arches showing the percentage has been met daily and weekly target. The purple arc is the weekly percentage. The other can change color depending on the activity that is being done.
Exist an external arc to the sphere with the percentage of battery remaining.
Icon shows the time and the actual temperature.
And of course, the time and date.

latest_release.release_notes: Now, with time, date, arcs activity, calories, km/miles information and weather, you have more battery life and more weather precision.

data.title: Pasos
